overview.summary_text: Hello! My name is Zafarbek Yunusov, and I am a dedicated full-stack web developer with a strong foundation in React.js, Django, and TailwindCSS. I have hands-on experience building dynamic and responsive web applications, including blogs, to-do list apps, and e-commerce platforms. My background in system administration and software development allows me to approach projects with a deep understanding of both frontend and backend technologies. I am always eager to learn, improve, and contribute to impactful web solutions.

university2.name: ISMA University of Applied Sciences
university2.thesis: Thesis: 'Developing SPA with Chat and Pong Game Integration: A Full-Stack Web Application.'

certificates.cert: 42 Programming School Certificate of Successfully Completing the Core Curriculum

projects.overview: These projects showcase my expertise in web development, backend engineering, and system programming, demonstrating my ability to build full-stack applications from scratch.

items.name: Blog Project
items.purpose: Developed a full-featured blog application with authentication, comments, and a sleek UI.

items.name: E-Commerce Platform
items.purpose: Built a scalable multi-vendor e-commerce platform with role-based access control and payment integration.

items.name: To-Do List Application
items.purpose: Created a to-do list application with authentication, task management, and responsive UI.

items.name: ft_transcendence
items.purpose: Developed a SPA featuring chat and multiplayer game integration.

items.name: libft
items.purpose: Recreated standard C library functions from scratch.

items.name: ft_printf
items.purpose: Implemented a custom printf function mimicking the standard printf.

items.name: get_next_line
items.purpose: Developed a function to read lines from a file efficiently.

items.name: push_swap
items.purpose: Created an algorithm to sort two stacks using sorting algorithms like insertion sort.

items.name: so_long
items.purpose: Developed a simple 2D game.

items.name: pipex
items.purpose: Implemented command forking and piping using system calls.

items.name: Philosophers
items.purpose: Solved the dining philosophers problem using multithreading.

items.name: minishell
items.purpose: Created a functional shell mimicking Bash shell features.

items.name: NetPractice
items.purpose: Explored networking concepts such as MAC addresses and IP configurations.

items.name: born2beroot
items.purpose: Configured a Debian Linux server on VirtualBox to deepen OS knowledge.

items.name: Inception
items.purpose: Learned and implemented Docker concepts, including creating Docker images and containers for nginx, WordPress, and MariaDB.

items.name: CPPModules
items.purpose: Started learning object-oriented programming and STL containers.

items.name: webserv
items.purpose: Created a web server implementing HTTP using socket programming.

items.name: Cub3d
items.purpose: Built a basic 3D game engine using raycasting.

items.name: Python for Data Science
items.purpose: Currently learning data science concepts using Python.

items.name: Cybersecurity Piscine
items.purpose: Worked on projects including hidden services (TOR), metadata analysis, reverse engineering, and developing a local malware program.
